    Leakage-proof nested CV for actflow model selection

    actflow_nested_cv.Rd

    Leakage-proof nested CV for actflow model selection

    actflow_nested_cv(
  data,
  outer_folds = 5,
  inner_folds = 5,
  estimator_grid,
  seed = NULL,
  save_splits = TRUE,
  artifact_path = NULL,
  selection_metric = c("corr", "R2", "mae"),
  comparison = "fullcompare_compthenavg",
  transfer = c("linear", "relu", "sigmoid", "logit"),
  use_cpp = TRUE,
  ...
)

    Arguments

    data

    A list with rest_group and task_group arrays, each 3D. Optional task_group_test can be supplied for evaluation targets.

    outer_folds

    Number of outer subject folds.

    inner_folds

    Number of inner subject folds used for model selection.

    estimator_grid

    Candidate estimators/hyperparameters as a list or data frame. For list input, each candidate should contain a method field and optional params list. For data frame input, include a method column and parameter columns.

    seed

    Optional RNG seed for reproducible folds and bootstrap-like sampling.

    save_splits

    If TRUE, include detailed fold assignments in output.

    artifact_path

    Optional path to persist nested-CV artifacts as JSON.

    selection_metric

    Metric used to select the winning candidate in inner CV. One of corr, R2, or mae.

    comparison

    Comparison mode passed to actflow_test(). Currently nested CV supports fullcompare_compthenavg.

    transfer

    Transfer function passed to actflow_test().

    use_cpp

    Use native kernels when available.

    ...

    Reserved for forward compatibility.

    Value

    A list with outer metrics, selected hyperparameters, split artifacts, and a reproducibility manifest.

    Contents

    Developed by Ben Buchsbaum.
